snippet.title: Shaun Ley's campaign week
snippet.description:
Election 2010 / 17 April 2010
… week's campaign. Keith Turbitt was sanding down the woodwork on a newly opened DIY shop in Colne in Lancashire when I met him early one morning…

snippet.title: Accidents mark bank holiday start
snippet.description:
UK / 2 May 2008
… blackspots near out-of-town DIY shops over the weekend. Areas affected could include the A23 Purley Way in Croydon, south London, the A406 North…

snippet.title: Transfer deadline day as it happened
snippet.description:
Football / 2 February 2009
… get Quaresma, I will carry the absolutely shocking Malouda myself all the way back to Lyon free of charge." George, a waiting Chelsea fan, London,…
